name: stuffed
content:
stuffed adjective
(FULL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A stuffed animal or bird is filled with special material so that it keeps the shape it had when it was alive: a collection of stuffed birds
[ after verb ] informal (of a person) having eaten enough or too much: "No more for me thanks - I'm stuffed." Synonyms
full (FOOD)
replete formal
sated formal
